name: Matrix operations
description: The following operations are available in the app: - Solving systems of linear equations using:  Gaussian elimination  Cramers rule  Gauss-Jordan  The inverse matrix method - Finding the determinant of a matrix using:  Sarrus rule (only for a 3x3 matrix)  First line decomposition  Reduction to triangular form - Finding the inverse of a matrix using:  Gaussian elimination  Gauss-Jordan  Algebraic complements - Finding the rank of a matrix using:  Elementary transformations  Bordering minors - Solving matrix equations - Raising a matrix to a power - Multiplying a matrix by a number - Matrix transposition - Matrix multiplication - Matrix subtraction - Matrix addition  App Features - Custom keyboard for more convenient data entry; - Complete, step by step description of solutions; - Ability to save solutions; - Ability to edit saved solutions - Works without internet access - Presents solutions as ordinary and decimal fractions  web version - https://matrix-operations.com
